content.rendered:
Directed by Sujoy Ghosh.

Written by Sujoy Ghosh. Sujoy Ghosh. Raj Vasant.

Cast Amitabh Bachchan(Badal Gupta). Taapsee Pannu(Naina Sethi). Amrita Singh(Rani Kaur Toor). Antonio Aakeel(Sunny Singh Toor). Tony Luke(Arjun Joseph). Tanveer Ghani(Nirmal Toor ‘Nimbi’). Tariqsafdar Hussain(Police sergeant). Mark Mansfield(T.V. Reporter) . April Agarwal-Aplin(Sanna Sethi).India Agarwal-Aplin. Sheblu Ahmed(Nobi). Cricknowle(Shera). Elena Roxana Maria Fernandes(Receptionist). Rachel Flynn(Rachael Joseph). Jason Hetherington(The Driver). Selina Hotwani(Jasmeet). Susanne Junghans(Emily Crosby). Maram Kamal(Hallie Hume). Manav Kaul(Jimmy Punjabi). Abdul Muktadir Laskar((voice)). Shome Makhija(Sunil Sethi). Daniel O’Kane(Hotel Boyfriend). Abhinay Raj Singh(Sunny (credit only)). Deependra Singh(Pihu). Denzil Smith(Detective Sondhi).Ammar Taalwala. Kartik Trivedi(Extra). Begonia Villalba(Police Officer). Vincent Woods(Officer 1). Paul Ellard(Train passenger (uncredited))

Languages Hindi. English.

Producers Gaurav Bose. Sham Chavan. Sanjana Chopra. Shaju Ignatius. Hetvi Karia. Gauri Khan. Sunir Kheterpal. Chris Martin. Sarwar Mohammad. Shah Naimish. Akshai Puri. Mahipal Karan Rathore. Sandeep Sharma. Ssunny Suraani. Gaurav Verma. Akhilesh Yadav.

Production Azure Entertainment. Red Chillies Entertainment. Universal Entertainment.
